data.title: National Basketball Association (NBA)
data.meta_description: National Basketball Association (NBA) | 552,150 followers on LinkedIn. #bringyourgame | The National Basketball Association (NBA) is a global sports and media organization with the mission to inspire and connect people everywhere through the power of basketball.‚ÄØ Built around five professional sports leagues:‚ÄØ the NBA, WNBA, NBA G League, NBA 2K League and Basketball Africa League, the NBA has established a major international presence with games and programming available in 215 countries and territories in more than 50 languages, and merchandise for sale in more than 200 countries and territories on all seven continents.‚ÄØNBA Digital‚Äôs assets include NBA TV, NBA.com, the NBA App and NBA League Pass.

üî• Top 10 Dunks of the 2023-24 NBA Season üî• Dunking is more than just a display of athleticism‚Äîit's a powerful expression of skill and creativity. These top 10 dunks of the 2023-24 NBA season showcase the NBA's highest risers, who elevate the intensity and excitement of every game. #NBADunkWeek

We are thrilled to celebrate another successful year of the ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs Invested‚Äù program with the WNBA, U.S. Bank and Project Destined. Through this powerful partnership, U.S. Bank employees mentor a Project Destined all-women cohort on financial education and personal branding. This year, all participants met in Chicago for a mid-season #networking and storytelling event and attended a Chicago Sky game! Learn more about: WNBA: https://lnkd.in/etS4FgJW Project Destined: https://lnkd.in/ehci3RC US Bank: usbank.com/about

SAVE THE DATE! üìÖ The 2024-25 regular season tips off on Tuesday, October 22. The first five days of the 2024-25 NBA regular season will feature 11 national television games as part of #KiaTipOff24, with two doubleheaders each on TNT and ESPN and a tripleheader on NBA TV. Check out the National TV Schedule for opening week and view the full regular season schedule on the NBA App: https://lnkd.in/eE7neTy7

Congratulations to Kensa Gunter, PsyD, CMPC and the NBA Mind Health team for winning FOUR Creative Awards for the work on Mind Health‚Äôs 2024 Mental Health Awareness Month campaign! NBA Mind Health‚Äôs Campaign: ‚ÄúJoin the Squad‚Äù was featured during #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth (May 2024). Aiming to elevate the conversation around mental health and #wellness and make it engaging and accessible to all, the campaign focused on six approaches to enhancing mental wellness. An interactive quiz allowed fans to match themselves to a team of animated personas each representing one of the six approaches: The Mind Health Squad included: (1) Move- Dynamic Defender, (2) Play- Playful Point Guard, (3) Pause- Centered Center, (4) Learn- Clever Coach, (5) Connect- Trusty Teammate, and (6) Nourish- Fueled Forward. Join the #NBAMindHealth Squad at: https://lnkd.in/gzEQpUed The dotComm Awards honored Mind Health with Gold Awards in two categories - Best Website Illustration and Best Website in the Health category: https://lnkd.in/eZbetGgw The NY Digital Awards honored Mind Health with Gold Awards in two categories - Best Website (Sport) and Best Website (Health): https://lnkd.in/gGwghJ2G Reingold, Inc.

The NBA Foundation recently celebrated its 4th anniversary with its 12th round of grants, awarding over $119 million to more than 240 organizations in all 28 NBA markets. The NBA Foundation hosted an anniversary celebration with 125 guests, partners and social impact leaders at the NBA offices for a panel discussion, networking event and the announcement of the latest grant round, which will provide $13.2M in grants to 47 nonprofit organizations. The panel discussion, moderated by Angela Yee, included people that have directly benefited from the Foundation‚Äôs grant-making and signature programs such as the All-Star Pitch Competition and HBCU Fellowship. To learn more about the NBA Foundation and its impact, visit NBAFoundation.com

Looking to crossover into the Business of Basketball? Applications for our third year of the Future Basketball Operations Stars (FBOS) program are now open! This six-month virtual training initiative delivers basketball operations and professional development content on topics including scouting, roster construction, on-and-off-court player development, analytics and the NBA Salary Cap. Applications close on August 9 - #BringYourGame and apply for this unique opportunity today! https://lnkd.in/eWmRanpq
